meanings.definition: The action or process of finalizing something.
meanings.sent1: The finalization of the project took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: The finalization of the contract was completed yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The finalization of the party decorations made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The finalization of the puzzle felt like putting the last piece in place.
meanings.sent5: The finalization of the plan brought a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.sent1: The finalization of the decision brought clarity to the situation.
meanings.sent2: The finalization of the deal was celebrated by all parties involved.
meanings.sent3: The finalization of the movie plot left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The finalization of the painting gave it a polished look.
meanings.sent5: The finalization of the recipe made it ready for sharing with friends.
